awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 8 wins & 2 nominations.

fullplot: Two families are unhappy with their respective relationships: first of ambitious businessman Jeffrey Byron and sexually frustrated Marianne and second of repair contractor Lucky Mann and former B-movie actress Phyllis. When Lucky arrives to Byron's apartment to make some minor repair and Marianne becomes obsessed with him, the everyday balance breaks.
plot: A handyman with marital problems meets a housewife with the same.
title: Afterglow
